text: Howell Harris is a Professor of History at Durham University, who has published many books and journal articles on the history of US business. He has also been a member of the Arts and Humanities Research Council's Peer Review College since 2004. In his spare time he enjoys allotment gardening. ==Books== * Right to Manage: Industrial Relations Policies of American Business in the 1940s (University of Wisconsin Press, 1982) * Bloodless Victories: The Rise and Fall of the Open Shop in the Philadelphia Metal Trades, 1890-1940 (Cambridge University Press, 2000) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Academics of Durham University
